title: Magic Sight
description: When Evie found out she was knocked up with the alpha's baby and a rare Kitsune with untold power, she thought life couldn't get anymore complicated.  Then she was told she was also the guardian of the gate to the underworld and that her dad was still alive. Now she has 48 hours to bring in the Siren who started this whole fiasco in the first place.  What could go wrong?  *18 and up recommended reading age. Sexy times and cussing are sure to be found in this series.
author: Leia Stone
